sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_servicenow_s_servicenow_scripting"> <x_snc_servicenow_s_servicenow_scripting action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <code_url/> <code_url_2/> <details>For example, you may choose to auto fill the assignment group based on the application selected. </details> <example_steps/> <example_url/> <module/> <number>SNSCRIPT0001018</number> <replaced_by/> <script>Check "Form Button" Set "Condition" to "current.u_request_form_status == 'Waiting Mgmt Approval' && current.u_requestor_name.manager == gs.getUserID()" Set "Script" to : current.u_request_form_status = 'Review/Work In Progress'; current.update(); </script> <script_2/> <script_type>UI Action</script_type> <short_description>Configure UI Action based on Conditions </short_description> <state>Submitted</state> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2016-08-12 00:44:11</sys_created_on> <sys_id>b83559bb13012a00dd7db5b12244b0ce</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2016-08-14 03:14:29</sys_updated_on> <tested_on_helsinki/> </x_snc_servicenow_s_servicenow_scripting> </record_update>
